article.title: Textron To Provide C2 Armored Vehicles and Support to U.S. Army
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: An $8.5 million firm-fixed-price contract has been awarded to Textron Systems Corporation for eight command and control armored security vehicles; 72 extended personnel carriers; three years of spares support for all 80 vehicles; 80 English/Arabic operator manuals; five English/Arabic maintenance and parts manuals; one English/Arabic CD of manuals; and two field service representatives for logistics, maintenance and training support for 24 months.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Center awarded the contract.
